locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ So, I will go inside, take a free shower with my rewards card (using my own soap), and go park at Pilot: if they have no soap here, I'm sure not going to eat here!!!

Husband and Wife team went in to Share a shower from working hard all day and wanted to buy dinner and stay the night. They wanted to charge us $30 to take a shared shower. $15/person. No thanks we won't be back. It's unfortunate we would ‚Ä¶

0630 am Aug 28th 2023 go into get shower . What like 9 - 10 total all showers down !  An yet the T/ A Petro App allowed me to register for a shower  (all showers down - No maintinance personel to clean showers NO Mgr aval in store to ‚Ä¶

I decided to take my shower here based on reviews.. That was a mistake. Shower room floor and walls were dirty with hair, there was no soap dispenser, and biggest issue of all for me, was the poor water pressure. No more coming here for ‚Ä¶

My wife and I are team drivers. When my wife got our shower ticket from Susan behind the desk, Susan informed her that it's to hard to clean the bigger showers. She said, and I quote "we only like to open it for fat people and the ‚Ä¶

If I could give negative stars I would. We came for showers, fuel, and food. August 1, 2020  3:00 am the shower attendant very nice gentlemen. Asked if we needed anything else and hoped we enjoyed our showers. The problem was store cashier. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ In addition, this evening, I stopped at the TA in Eloy AZ to find that I can not have a shower due to staffing issues. I've had a long day and wanted to enjoy a hot shower. This is a service that they insist that they provide. ‚Ä¶

I‚Äôm a truck driver I tried to get a shower and they said they don‚Äôt have maintenance to clean the showers he gets here at 6:30 in the morning it‚Äôs 530 my time I don‚Äôt know why you offer 24 hour service if you don‚Äôt have one that‚Äôs all right ‚Ä¶
I like this truck stop as a hole, my only complaint was the shower # 6 needs a strong detail cleaning other wise it was clean, great water pressure. Hope this gets too a manager
Got an awesome hair cut yesterday at the barbershop inside. Very friendly as wellüëçShower was very clean as well as the rest of the establishment. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ to stop. But this review has 1 star written all over it. Do the employees even clean the showers before they open it to drivers? I have a hunch that men are the janitors here, due to the lack of attention to detail. Plain disgusting, and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ up significantly.  The truck drivers entitled attitudes everytime I come here is unreal with drivers blocking the fuel lanes to go inside and take a shower and whatever else, and not even be pulled up to the pumps at that!  They have a ‚Ä¶

Do yall even clean the showers. Almost $20 for a shower, and its filthy. Love's should take their name off of this building. I wouldn't want my name on that place. The drink despinser is absolutely nasty. Do yall own a mop? Gross. I want ‚Ä¶
No hooks in the shower to hang your bag or towel. The water was warm but not hot. I don't think I would pay for a shower again.

Showers were disgusting. Hair all over toilet. Shaving cream still on shower floor. Bathroom floor not clean. I think the girl "cleaning" the bathrooms just threw in clean towels and was done. After my shower there were 3 people in line ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ is clean and accommodating to not just 18-wheelers, but 4 wheelers as well! The layout doesn't cause us to intermingle with the shower crowd to grab a slice of pizza. The restrooms are maintained, and typically, the pumps aren't too busy.

‚Ä¶ . The inside is still crowded and looks dusty and dirty. The showers have no ventilation or refrigerated air,  so you leave your shower all sweaty. The new wood grain tile recently installed is all black with a orange color mildew. The ‚Ä¶
Went over the road for a vacay. Missed the otr experience. Stopped here for a shower. Shower #2,was not exactly gleaming. Hey, the shower was hot.

This is the dirtiest Love‚Äôs I have ever been in. The floors were dirty when i walked in (about 3am). Shower #1 was like a sauna inside.   When I walked in, the heat hit me in the face. It was 80 degrees outside, and it felt cooler than this ‚Ä¶

This place is horrible For all drivers and all who travel I have photos to prove it also most fell in the shower railing almost came off the wall the floors are being mopped with dirty water and not clean dirt all around the toilet mold ‚Ä¶

locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I'll give them a 3 and that's because of the damn shower situation.. AGAIN! As far as points and offers, I give them a 5 but they really have to address the cleanliness of the showers. Once again I get a shower that was absolutely not ‚Ä¶

Place is decent and somewhat clean. I booked a shower with one ahead of me. And I went in the building. All the showers were open. No one cleaning them out. Getting them ready so the next driver could shower
Every single shower of all showers is empty and I was the only guest waiting. I asked them why I‚Äôm waiting they said showers are not clean and no body there to clean them. I mean is this a joke.
Bad location for a shower, I‚Äôve had this happen to me multiple times at this location. It‚Äôs horrible when you spend over 4k$ on fuel each month and can‚Äôt even get a shower. ‚Ä¶
Great place to get a shower and take a break. Free WiFi!

‚Ä¶ are dumpster fires but not this one. The parking lot is clean and big, the interior of the store was clean and had self check out registers. Didn't shower, had a sign about showers being out of order so I can't speak on the cleanliness.

Stupid, unprofessional people works here! As a professional driver, I have unlimited shower for this month, but cashier told that no shower because system shutdown. So what? You have a water, you have a keys, what a problem to open the door ‚Ä¶

They do it all the time, we all truck drivers after a long day driving, we just want to take a shower and sleep, but every time they come out with that excuse. Horrible service because they just don‚Äôt want to work, lazy people!!
I dont even want to gave then 1 star i book a shower and there is no toilet paper nd they only providing hot shower i mean its too hot outside seriously team is really sick

‚Ä¶ an inch of dirt on top of all the machines. I won't even buy coffee here. The showers might have good water pressure that's great. I watched an employee clean a shower here once. They use the dirty towels from the last person in the ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I don‚Äôt expect a 5star resort but I would like to have a clean bathroom to shower after a long day of work with a door that locks properly and doesn‚Äôt have mold and other peoples hair laying around! I‚Äôm grossed out. Did I mention my shower ‚Ä¶
Shower 4 has the hot/cold water diverter leaking water everywhere from the back of the fixture. Meaning it‚Äôs not only wasting water but also costing you guys money. Do better and fix the problem.
This truck stop has over 200 parking spots, and there is a Dennys , and it has a lounge also a laundry room. All you need to shower üöø and spend the night. ‚Ä¶
Friendly and professional staff. I had an issue with my shower ticket, Cynthia helped me to got a new one with the phone number.. ‚Ä¶

The showers are not clean and there was no hot water. I very much did NOT appreciate taking a cold shower after a long day of working. I decided to try and give them another chance (it's been 2 months). This time the shower was clean and ‚Ä¶

Friendly staff and has a  nice waiting area for showers. But the shower rooms were not cleaned properly. Garbage not emptied, hair all over  sink and in shower. Toilet wasn‚Äôt cleaned. The bottom looked like nobody has every wiped it. Towels ‚Ä¶

Attendants are rude!! Came to take a shower and had to wait over 30 minutes before manager cleaned one of the showers when there was 5 empty! Went to attendant several times with her telling me that someone was cleaning a shower when there ‚Ä¶
Pilot  how do you expect  a grown man to use this? Shower #10 I'd love  to see your  mangers  come  sit  on this and say that's acceptable
Shower nice clean ! guy was just finishing mopping handed my husband and I warm towels .. extra one when requested.  laundry area needs a little cleaning but not bad all machines worked ‚Ä¶

I walk into this location to get myself a shower, I‚Äôve already set up my shower on the app, I walk in and there‚Äôs six shower doors open with towels, laying everywhere, nobody washing showers. I go up front to tell the manager and she ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Like most people i was here for the night ran into Joanna at the front desk she was nice friendly and kind but the highlight of the visit was how clean my shower was. A fella by the name of Andrew handled that. Overall this is a great place ‚Ä¶
Raul.... awesome customer service.  Shower room was clean, and love the atmosphere with friendly staff. Thank you for a great experience.

This truck stop has a lot of bugs that need to be worked out. Been there twice and my fuel nozzle hose fell off while pumping. The fuel pump shut off while pumping and the screen did is system reboot. My shower toilet wouldn‚Äôt flush.
Better than pilot. The only problem I found was they only had 1 shower while I was three and 1 driver waiting for it.
Good place to stop for fuel and shower..very clean restrooms.

Clean  shower and restroom..
Great service
Very spacious parking, clean bathrooms, shower always available, excellent service from the working staff

showerReviews.reviewText: I used to like this petro until today. My shower was ok but I noticed after I showered that there was human feces on the hair dryer.  As I was leaving I made a comment about feeling better after a shower and as I was walking away the porter ‚Ä¶
So far best Petro  super clean shower always

It's one of the better truck stop chain's. Clean restaurants,convenient stores, parkin lot's and showers!!! Employees seem respectful and nice!!! But I only stop there late at night to take a shower. And the shower's are always really clean ‚Ä¶
Paid 18.00 dollars for a dirty shower.cashier was great.she helped me find a charger cord.trash cans were full.

Lots of parking, decent store, and above average restaurant. Shower was little run down, clean, but small. Fuel price high compared to pride truck stop next door. Has a female buetican/barber. All and all above average stop
Plentiful truck parking.  Showers are adequate and clean, almost to a womens standard because it has hair blow dryer and sitting area inside shower room.  Nice amenities to choose from.
Lots of parking but after 7/8 pm it‚Äôs hard to get it ! Too busy ! Shower 8 was good ! Parking needs work !
TA, Petro cut off my card due to non use. Instead of the ladies trying to help they said 15$ didn't help provide phone # completely rude. I went across the street for shower and purches.

Restaurant OPENS at 7 a.m.
Drivers lounge open now.
Shower with plenty of hot water.
Worst shower ive experienced  on the road, no toilet paper or soap and water didn't get hot

showerReviews.reviewText: Rude people. Cleaner lady shouted on me about unclean shower with no towels . Offered me not to use shower if I do not like it. 8.20 pm on 5/29/2025

Hands down the BEST shower I've had in a while! The woman at the counter was super friendly, and gave my husband and I extra towels so we could shower together. They left us alone and weren't sticklers on time. I would definitely come here ‚Ä¶

Clean store, well stocked for what I was looking for, very friendly people at the counter and Subway. The shower was incredibly clean, stocked and well maintained. The maintenance man I spoke with was friendly and helpful. Complete opposite ‚Ä¶

After fueling I paid full price for a shower, which is fine, however, the fat clerk working the fuel desk gave me a towel that had a 4" hole, tattered ends, and black grease and filth on it. I requested another towel.  She assigned me to a ‚Ä¶
_ shower is better than Pilot & J. Clean & clean.

Very disappointed. I waited about an hour to take a shower cause the maintenance person was on a break and apparently no one else know how to clean a shower. Customer service is bad I mean no courtesy for the driver and I received a second ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of my truck were buying fuel there at the same time we bought $950 of fuel and she wouldn‚Äôt give the driver a shower because the driver was new and didn‚Äôt have a loyalty card obviously she didn‚Äôt she offer any solutions just all she had to ‚Ä¶
Spend $800.00 on Disel ask for shower and the manager wanted to charge me $7.00 lost my business.
No wait for a shower, open concept and very clean.
Of the showers ain't like this. It's not a shower.
